entry_requirements.visa_required_note: All Indian citizens need to apply for a visa in advance. South Korea currently does not offer e-visa or visa on arrival for Indian citizens.

visa_types.name: C-3 Tourist Visa
visa_types.note: Most common visa for Indian tourists

visa_types.name: Business Visa (C-3-4)
visa_types.note: Priority processing available for business visas

visa_types.name: Transit Visa
visa_types.purpose: For long layovers with city exit

application_method: VFS Global Korea centers in India
Embassy/Consulates of the Republic of Korea

Recent Passport-size Photo (35mm x 45mm, white background, matte finish)
Cover Letter (purpose of visit, duration, funding details)
Hotel Booking (full stay period) OR invitation from host

visa_fees.note: Fees are non-refundable, even if visa is rejected

application_steps: Book an appointment with VFS Global Korea
Submit documents at your nearest VFS centre
Collect the passport or opt for courier return
important_notes: South Korea does not allow online or e-visa applications for Indian citizens as of 2024
Overstaying is a serious offense in Korea â€“ may result in fines or blacklisting
Tourist visas cannot be extended inside Korea
Always carry printed visa copy, return ticket, hotel booking, and proof of funds while entering Korea

sample_cover_letter.format:
To: Embassy of the Republic of Korea
Subject: Tourist Visa Request
Dear Sir/Madam,
I am [Your Name], holding Indian Passport No. XXXXXXXX, planning to visit South Korea from [start date] to [end date] for tourism. I have enclosed all required documents including return tickets and accommodation details. I kindly request you to grant me a tourist visa.
Sincerely,
[Signature]
[Contact Info]
